Detailed Description

Header file for ConfigDescriptor.c.

Define Documentation

#define MAX_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_SIZE   512

Maximum size of a device configuration descriptor which can be processed by the host, in bytes

#define MOUSE_CLASS   0x03

Interface Class value for the Human Interface Device class

#define MOUSE_PROTOCOL   0x02

Interface Protocol value for a Boot Protocol Mouse compliant device

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum MouseHost_GetConfigDescriptorDataCodes_t

Enum for the possible return codes of the ProcessConfigurationDescriptor() function.

Enumerator:
SuccessfulConfigRead 

Configuration Descriptor was processed successfully

ControlError 

A control request to the device failed to complete successfully

DescriptorTooLarge 

The device's Configuration Descriptor is too large to process

InvalidConfigDataReturned 

The device returned an invalid Configuration Descriptor

NoHIDInterfaceFound 

A compatible HID interface was not found in the device's Configuration Descriptor

NoEndpointFound 

A compatible HID IN endpoint was not found in the device's HID interface

Function Documentation

uint8_t DComp_NextMouseInterface ( void *  CurrentDescriptor  ) 

Descriptor comparator function. This comparator function is can be called while processing an attached USB device's configuration descriptor, to search for a specific sub descriptor. It can also be used to abort the configuration descriptor processing if an incompatible descriptor configuration is found.

This comparator searches for the next Interface descriptor of the correct Mouse HID Class and Protocol values.

Returns:
A value from the DSEARCH_Return_ErrorCodes_t enum
uint8_t DComp_NextMouseInterfaceDataEndpoint ( void *  CurrentDescriptor  ) 

Descriptor comparator function. This comparator function is can be called while processing an attached USB device's configuration descriptor, to search for a specific sub descriptor. It can also be used to abort the configuration descriptor processing if an incompatible descriptor configuration is found.

This comparator searches for the next IN Endpoint descriptor inside the current interface descriptor, aborting the search if another interface descriptor is found before the required endpoint.

Returns:
A value from the DSEARCH_Return_ErrorCodes_t enum
uint8_t ProcessConfigurationDescriptor ( void   ) 

Reads and processes an attached device's descriptors, to determine compatibility and pipe configurations. This routine will read in the entire configuration descriptor, and configure the hosts pipes to correctly communicate with compatible devices.

This routine searches for a HID interface descriptor containing at least one Interrupt type IN endpoint.

Returns:
An error code from the MouseHost_GetConfigDescriptorDataCodes_t enum.
